metadata.description: FCCPS AI Committee public snapshot - derived from Source of Truth

workstreams.name: Research & Shared Baseline
workstreams.description: Shared baseline on capabilities, limits, misconceptions, and district-facing context.

workstreams.name: Policy/Recommendation Drafting
workstreams.description: Integrates workstream outputs into policy recommendations and board-ready artifacts.

workstreams.name: Classroom Practice & Examples
workstreams.description: Develops grade-banded classroom scenarios and teacher-facing implementation examples.

workstreams.name: Assessment & Integrity
workstreams.description: Defines attribution expectations and academic integrity guardrails by grade and assessment type.

workstreams.name: Data Privacy & Security
workstreams.description: Produces privacy/security requirements and AI tool review governance criteria.

workstreams.name: Equity & Access
workstreams.description: Applies an equity and accessibility lens to policy, tools, and implementation pathways.

workstreams.name: Communications & Community Input
workstreams.description: Creates stakeholder communications, FAQ artifacts, and community feedback intake plans.

workstreams.name: Implementation/PD & Change Adoption
workstreams.description: Defines rollout, professional development, and continuous-improvement operating model.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 2
timeline_events.description: Shared baseline alignment and working agreements confirmation.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 4
timeline_events.description: Recommendations outline and risk register checkpoint.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 5
timeline_events.description: Draft recommendations workshop and integration sequencing.

timeline_events.title: Draft sections complete
timeline_events.description: Initial domain draft package is complete for integration.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 6
timeline_events.description: Near-final package integration and comms/implementation alignment.

timeline_events.title: Board-ready package
timeline_events.description: Board-ready recommendation package is assembled for final review.

timeline_events.title: Meeting 7
timeline_events.description: Presentation prep and final review feedback assimilation.

deliverables.title: Team Charter v0
deliverables.description: Committee charter and operating scope baseline approved in Meeting 1.

deliverables.title: Working agreements and collaboration operating rules
deliverables.description: Working agreements, timeline/objectives draft, and collaboration rules.

deliverables.title: Definitions and assumptions pre-read
deliverables.description: Definitions, assumptions, misconceptions, and draft grade-band framing.

deliverables.title: Meeting 3 risks/opportunities synthesis
deliverables.description: Collected member submissions of top risks and opportunities for Meeting 3.

deliverables.title: Policy principles set
deliverables.description: Board-ready policy principles with tradeoff framing.

deliverables.title: Shared Baseline Brief v1
deliverables.description: Capabilities, misconceptions, and shared definitions baseline.

deliverables.title: Recommendations outline and first-pass risk register
deliverables.description: Integrated recommendations structure and initial top-risk mitigation register.

deliverables.title: Policy Skeleton v0
deliverables.description: Policy draft scaffold with sections, decisions, and version log.

deliverables.title: Scenario Bank v1
deliverables.description: Grade-banded classroom scenarios with implementation exemplars.

deliverables.title: Attribution & Integrity Matrix v1
deliverables.description: Grade-band and assessment-type matrix for attribution and integrity practices.

deliverables.title: AI Tool Review Checklist v1 + Risk Tiers
deliverables.description: Privacy/security checklist and risk-tiering model for tool governance.

deliverables.title: Equity Impact Checklist v1
deliverables.description: Equity and accessibility lens checklist for policy and implementation decisions.

deliverables.title: Draft sections for priority recommendation domains
deliverables.description: Drafted recommendation sections for selected domains and governance direction.

deliverables.title: Near-final recommendation package
deliverables.description: Integrated recommendation package, slide narrative, and gap-owner list.

deliverables.title: Comms Pack v1
deliverables.description: Stakeholder messaging, FAQ draft, and community input plan.

deliverables.title: Implementation Roadmap v1
deliverables.description: Implementation and PD roadmap with milestones, cadence, and success measures.

deliverables.title: Final talk track and Q&A prep
deliverables.description: Final presentation talk track and supporting Q&A sheet for review cycle.

deliverables.title: Formal committee response package
deliverables.description: Formal response to proposed policy with guardrails and governance recommendations.
